mapper.select: SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_VER, R.VER_STATUS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE_PKG WHERE RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID) AS RULE_PKG_COUNT, R.RULE_NM, R.DFLT_SALIENCE, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.RULE_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, R.CAMP_ID, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, R.REG_USRID, M.MEMBER_NAME REG_USRNM, DATE_FORMAT(R.UDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS UDT_DT, R.UDT_USRID, M1.MEMBER_NAME UDT_USRNM FROM ( SELECT RULE_ID, MAX(RULE_VER) RULE_VER FROM targetai.RULE R GROUP BY RULE_ID ) A LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE R ON (A.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID AND A.RULE_VER = R.RULE_VER) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (R.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M1 ON (R.UDT_USRID = M1.MEMBER_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND RULE_ID = #{ruleId_search} AND REG_USRID = #{ruleRegUsrId_search} AND RULE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ruleNm_search}, '%') ORDER BY RULE_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT RULE_ID, MAX(RULE_VER) RULE_VER FROM targetai.RULE R GROUP BY RULE_ID ) A LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE R ON (A.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID AND A.RULE_VER = R.RULE_VER) WHERE 1=1 AND RULE_ID = #{ruleId_search} AND REG_USRID = #{ruleRegUsrId_search} AND RULE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ruleNm_search}, '%')

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_VER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE_PKG WHERE RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID) AS RULE_PKG_COUNT, R.RULE_NM, R.DFLT_SALIENCE, CASE WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'R' THEN '운영중' WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'D' THEN '개발중' WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'T' THEN '종료' END AS VER_STATUS, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.RULE_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, R.CAMP_ID, DATE_FORMAT(R.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS REG_DT, R.REG_USRID, M.MEMBER_NAME REG_USRNM, DATE_FORMAT(R.UDT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS UDT_DT, R.UDT_USRID, M1.MEMBER_NAME UDT_USRNM FROM targetai.RULE R LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M ON (R.REG_USRID = M.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN targetai.MEMBER M1 ON (R.UDT_USRID = M1.MEMBER_ID) WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId} ORDER BY RULE_VER DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM targetai.RULE WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId}

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_VER, R.REF_RULE_ID, (SELECT RULE_NM FROM targetai.RULE WHERE RULE_ID = R.REF_RULE_ID) AS REF_RULE_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE_PKG WHERE RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID) AS RULE_PKG_COUNT, R.RULE_NM, R.DFLT_SALIENCE, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.FUNC_NMS, R.FUNC_IMPORTS, R.RULE_WHEN, R.RULE_WHEN_KOR, R.RULE_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, R.CAMP_ID, R.TARGET_TYPE, R.REG_DT, R.REG_USRID, R.UDT_DT, R.UDT_USRID FROM targetai.RULE R WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND R.RULE_VER = #{ruleVer}
SELECT count(*) FROM targetai.RULE R WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND R.VER_STATUS = 'D'
SELECT FACTOR_ID, PID, FACTOR_NM, FACTOR_NM_EN, FACTOR_TYPE, DATA_TYPE, NUM_OF_GRP, CATEGORY_YN, ATTR_USE_YN FROM targetai.FACTOR WHERE ATTR_USE_YN = 'Y' AND FACTOR_ID = #{factorId}
SELECT FACTOR_ID, VAL FROM targetai.FACTOR_VAL WHERE FACTOR_ID = #{factorId}
SELECT FACTOR_ID, DEFAULT_VALUE, ARG_NM, `ORDER`, DATA_TYPE, REG_DT FROM targetai.FACTOR_FUNC_ARGS WHERE FACTOR_ID = #{factorId} ORDER BY `ORDER` ASC

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_NM, R.NO_LOOP, R.LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, R.AGENDA_GRP, RP.SALIENCE, R.EFFECTIVE_DT, R.EXPIRES_DT, R.ENABLED, R.DURATION, R.FUNC_NMS, R.FUNC_IMPORTS, R.RULE_WHEN, R.RULE_THEN, R.NUM_OF_TGT, RP.PKG_ID, R.CAMP_ID, R.REG_DT FROM targetai.RULE_PKG RP LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE R ON (RP.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID AND RP.RULE_VER = R.RULE_VER) WHERE RP.PKG_ID = #{PKG_ID} AND RP.PKG_VER = #{VER}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO targetai.RULE ( RULE_ID, REF_RULE_ID, RULE_NM, RULE_VER, DFLT_SALIENCE, VER_STATUS, NO_LOOP, LOCK_ON_ACTIVE, FUNC_NMS, FUNC_IMPORTS, RULE_WHEN, RULE_WHEN_KOR, TARGET_TYPE, REG_USRID ) VALUES ( #{ruleId}, #{refRuleId}, #{ruleNm}, #{ruleVer}, #{dfltSalience}, 'D', #{noLoop}, #{lockOnActive}, #{FUNC_NMS}, #{FUNC_IMPORTS}, #{RULE_WHEN}, #{RULE_WHEN_KOR}, #{targetType}, #{REG_USER_ID} )
SELECT #{ruleId} AS RULE_ID FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE targetai.RULE SET RULE_NM = #{ruleNm}, NO_LOOP = #{noLoop}, DFLT_SALIENCE = #{dfltSalience}, LOCK_ON_ACTIVE = #{lockOnActive}, FUNC_NMS = #{FUNC_NMS}, FUNC_IMPORTS = #{FUNC_IMPORTS}, RULE_WHEN = #{RULE_WHEN}, RULE_WHEN_KOR = #{RULE_WHEN_KOR}, TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType}, UDT_DT = NOW(), UDT_USRID = #{USER_ID} WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND VER_STATUS = 'D'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targetai.RULE WHERE RULE_NM = #{ruleNm} AND RULE_ID != #{ruleId}

SELECT R.RULE_ID, R.RULE_NM, R.RULE_VER, CASE WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'R' THEN '운영중' WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'D' THEN '개발중' WHEN R.VER_STATUS = 'T' THEN '종료' END AS RULE_VER_STATUS, RP.PKG_ID, RP.PKG_VER, P.PKG_NM, CASE WHEN PV.VER_STATUS = 'R' THEN '운영중' WHEN PV.VER_STATUS = 'D' THEN '개발중' WHEN PV.VER_STATUS = 'T' THEN '종료' END AS PKG_VER_STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(PV.RUN_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS RUN_START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(PV.RUN_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') AS RUN_END_DATE FROM targetai.RULE R LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE_PKG RP ON (R.RULE_ID = RP.RULE_ID AND R.RULE_VER = RP.RULE_VER) LEFT JOIN targetai.PKG_VER PV ON (RP.PKG_ID = PV.PKG_ID AND RP.PKG_VER = PV.PKG_VER AND PV.VER_STATUS != 'T') LEFT JOIN targetai.PKG P ON (PV.PKG_ID = P.PKG_ID) WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND R.VER_STATUS = 'R' AND PV.VER_STATUS IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT count(*) FROM targetai.RULE R LEFT JOIN targetai.RULE_PKG RP ON (R.RULE_ID = RP.RULE_ID AND R.RULE_VER = RP.RULE_VER) LEFT JOIN targetai.PKG_VER PV ON (RP.PKG_ID = PV.PKG_ID AND RP.PKG_VER = PV.PKG_VER AND PV.VER_STATUS != 'T') LEFT JOIN targetai.PKG P ON (PV.PKG_ID = P.PKG_ID) WHERE R.RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND R.VER_STATUS = 'R' AND PV.VER_STATUS IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE targetai.RULE SET VER_STATUS = 'T' WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND VER_STATUS = 'R'

SELECT RULE_VER AS ruleDeployVer FROM targetai.RULE WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND VER_STATUS = 'R'
UPDATE targetai.RULE SET VER_STATUS = 'R' WHERE RULE_ID = #{ruleId} AND VER_STATUS = 'D'
mapper.select: SELECT RULE_ID FROM targetai.RULE ORDER BY RULE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
